document_data.mainbody:
Hask Bloodaxe was the sword-thane of the Black Lion tribe of Uthgardt barbarians that lived in Beorunnas Well during the late-14 century DR. As sword-thane, Hask served as the personal bodyguard to chief Andar Heartwood.
In addition to guarding the chieftain, Hask was the primary law-keeper for the Black Lions of Beorunnas Well.
